hub.title: Multimedia Learning
hub.subtitle: Learn languages using real-world multimedia. Translate photos and audio instantly.
hub.learnFromWorldDesc: Use our multimedia tools to translate text from photos you take or audio you record. Perfect for learning on the go, traveling, or practicing with authentic content.

photoTranslation.title: Photo Translation
photoTranslation.description: Point your camera at any text and get instant translations with vocabulary analysis.
photoTranslation.step2: Take a photo of text you want to translate
photoTranslation.step3: Get instant translation with verb & adjective analysis
photoTranslation.step4: Save new words to your vocabulary lists

audioTranslation.title: Audio Translation
audioTranslation.description: Record speech and get translations. Great for practicing pronunciation and understanding.
audioTranslation.step2: Speak in English or your native language
audioTranslation.step4: Review and practice the translated text

photoTips.title: Photo Tips
photoTips.tip1: Ensure good lighting for clear text recognition
photoTips.tip2: Hold camera steady and focus on the text
photoTips.tip3: Capture only the text you want translated

audioTips.title: Audio Tips
audioTips.tip1: Speak clearly and at a normal pace
audioTips.tip3: Pause between sentences for better accuracy
